text: Jemis anɨb agek, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok dɨl, bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal okok dɨl, binɨb yokɨp Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok dɨl, mɨdupsek agɨlak, Bɨ chɨn omɨŋal ak, Judas ayɨp Saylas ayɨp aglon, Pol ayɨp, Banabas ayɨp taun Adiyok amnɨlaŋ agɨlak. Bɨ Judas anɨb ak yɨb olap Basabas agelɨgɨpal.
